title: Ryze Seriously Needs A Buff..... 39% Winrate?!

embed.description: League of Legends Statistics including Win Rate, Ban Rate, Play Rate, Kills, Deaths by Champions and the roles they play.

body:
I just checked Ryze's winrate and he has a 39% win rate?! I really like Ryze but he is literally the worst champion in the game right now. I feel like the nerf a while ago was super unfair as they removed 40% dmg from his Q! Which is his main source of damage. Please Riot buff ryze love playing him but hes utter garbage right now, thanks. 

Also my suggestion would be to rework his ult, its just cancerous as it gets abused at high elo's and is fairly meaningless at lower elo's, thanks again.

replies.body: It's not the snare alone making him strong, it's the ulti, which is used by pro players on a coordinated team to do amazing things.  In solo queue it's used as a messy way to comit suicide most of the time anyone trys to 'make plays' with it.
That Win Rate, thanks to 80% Bronze - Gold Players, i see so many amazing Ryze and i feel like KMS when i see them

You can't judge a champion completely by their win rate.

In my experience, Ryze performs just fine, I don't seem to have any trouble playing him, and I've seen enemy Ryze's do well as well. 
He is powerful when he needs to be, but only if you play him right.

He has a long as hell snare, very high sustained damage, a free move speed boost and mega shield, and a free escape from any fight. 
He has the makings of a very OP champion, so in order to keep the Ryze masters at an appropriate win rate, his overall win rate needs to be low. (Azir is the same, Azir masters are deadly as fuck, and bad Azir's are near worthless) It's all about skill. 

If you know your champion inside and out, and practice, you'll perform just fine regardless of whatever your champion's win rate is.
